Windlord::

Windlord continued firing to Alliance members and he moved wher 
Chordate was and took him and flew quickly in order to put him safe 
where were all maximals.

"Angel Prime..." said the hwak throw his com link "Cover me... I'm 
saving a Inconceus Maximal... Where could he be safe?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Sorry if my posts are a little out of order, last day of freedom 
until I 
> have to go back to prison, I mean school, so I'm not in a good 
mood.  Also, 
> IR, Dark Wolf seperated so it's now the three smaller robots)
> 
> The Oblitercons/Defensor/Double 
> Punch/Beeline/Injector/Bumblebee/Manterror/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Nemesis 
> Enforcer/Scattershot/Chordate/Ares/Demon Wulf:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Oblitertron continued to fall the relatively short distance, his 
fire 
> resistant armor, thanks to one of his robot components Pyro 
protected him 
> from damage, the only thing the behemoth felt was agonizing heat.
> 
> He hit the ground, smashing into his five seperate robot parts, and 
Chordate 
> fell out, all scattered, except Dark One and Chordate were close to 
each 
> other.
> 
> Dark One got up and jumped on Chrodate, transforming into his jet 
fighter 
> mode, Chordate in the cockpit, the straps tightening around him so 
he 
> couldn't move even if he were consciouss.  He lifted off into the 
air, giving 
> more power to his engines and energizing his weapons.
> 
> The rest of the Oblitercons got up and began to ran after Dark One, 
spreading 
> out so they couldn't all be hurt by large blasts.
> 
> ---
> 
> Defensor seperated, the five robots arming their weapons to go 
after the 
> Oblitercons.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch watched Beeline strafe missiles with his optic blast, 
one 
> getting through and knocking Double Punch back, the explosive 
shells and 
> other blasts knocking him to his back.  He raised both pinchers, 
launching 
> one energy-signature seeking missile at Sideswipe, another of the 
same type 
> from the other pincher at Torca.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector raised his backside,  his stinger pointed at Torca.  He 
fired off 
> two stinger missiles at the Maximal, hovering in his 
lionfish/hornet mode.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror flew to the left, the missile knocking him out of the way 
of other 
> shots.  "SLAGGING MAXIS!" he yelled frustrated, lifting one arm and 
firing 
> three ion disks at Ratchet, another three from the opposite arm at 
Kluster.
> 
> ---
> 
> Bumblebee fired off a two optic blasts off at Ratchet.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sixshot stumbled back, but keeping his balance, as the missiles 
exploded 
> against his armor.  He made no expression even though he was in 
great pain 
> and raised his arms.  He fired two blasts from both guns, sending 
four blasts 
> from his hypersonic concussion blasters at Sky Lynx.
> 
> ---
> 
> Ares jumped to the side, dodging the missiles and shots, the blasts 
of the 
> missiles scarring his armor, leaving numerous burnt marks that were 
on the 
> brink of breaking open and exposing mech-fluid.  He got up in pain, 
firing 
> off a grenade at Sideswipe.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher destroyed the incoming missiles with optic blasts and 
flew off 
> after Vehement as ordered by his leader, no longer caring about 
this petty 
> feud.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector intercepted a few shells with an optic blast, several 
more blowing 
> apart a chunk of his armor and knocking him down, the Brotherhood 
member 
> gripping his leaking mode.  He flew off after Sun Crusher, gaining 
velocity 
> quickly, not wanting to participate in the battle anymore.
> 
> ---
> 
> The second-in-command watched Iron Raptor with recollection.  He 
remembered 
> the sword and saw it charging up.  He transformed to his bat mode, 
using the 
> thirty foot wingspan to his advantage, which is much larger than 
his wings in 
> biped mode.
> 
> But there were numerous small patches that looked badly burned, and 
Nemesis 
> knew they would give way and the numerous gaps would allow enough 
to come 
> through and blow him to the Inferno and the Void at once.  He 
covered up his 
> ten foot form as best he could , preparing for the inevitable.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot watched a familiar scene and shook a finger towards 
Iron Raptor.  
> "Nope, nope, nope.  We aren't going through this again.  But should 
I do what 
> I plan to do? After all, won't Nemesis still be injured?  Oh, 
well." 
> 
> He reached into the depths of his subspace pocket, pulling out a 
square 
> charge several inches thich and a foot wide.  He pressed a large 
red button, 
> throwing it as hard as he could.
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis' sensors told him the blast was coming pretty fast, and 
then his 
> scanners picked up a charge.  "SCATTERSHOT!  WHAT THE SLAG ARE YOU 
DOING!?" 
> he screamed, knowing Scattershot could hear him.
> 
> "I'm saving you!"
> 
> "HOW THE SL--AIIIIIE!" he screamed as the charge was hit by the 
blast and 
> exploded, the explosion protecting Nemesis from IR's blast, but the 
charge 
> exploded nonetheless and hit Nemesis, sending him crashing downward.
> 
> He hit the ground from several dozen feet up in the air, painfully 
reverting 
> to biped mode and slipping into a near state of stasis lock, unable 
to move 
> but still awake.
> 
> Scattershot sighed.  "Guess he can't thank me now!" he yelled in 
anger, 
> turning to Iron Raptor and firing down ten armor piercing rounds at 
her left 
> shoulder.
> 
> ---
> 
> Demon Wulf saw the oncoming blast and opened his chest wide to let 
it hit a 
> good spot.  The blast struck and knocked him back a few meters, the 
Vok 
> creation slamming to the ground, not getting up with a charred 
chest.  He let 
> out a weak growl, his body starting to glow red.
